column5: Over a month ago I posted that I was pretty sure that I won a Dewalt Tools grand prize draw consisting of an hour on the ice with Phaneuf, flight, hotel, autographed jersey, and tickets to a Leafs game. I must admit that I was getting nervous because it's been almost 5 weeks since I sent the forms and skill testing question back, and have yet to hear anything. Did I answer the skill testing question wrong? Did I fill out a form wrong? I think I've told every person that I know on the planet that I won this thing and would really, really hate to have to tell them all that no, I didn't win.    Anyways, today I got the e mail that confirms that I did in fact win.  Hello Dan:    Congratulations on winning the DEWALT â€™s Guaranteed Tough Ultimate On-Ice Experience with Dion Phaneuf.  I will be in touch shortly to provide further details on the prize package.  I do have a couple preliminary questions for you:  * What level of hockey experience do you and your guest have?  For example, do you still play hockey or played hockey in the past but no longer play, or have never played hockey but am comfortable skating forwards and backwards. * Could you please confirm your contact information?  Congratulations again and I will give you a call within the next week to begin planning your trip to Toronto.  Best regards,  Jocelyn Stephen Brand Manager - DEWALT   Now my level of hockey experience is a joke. I did play as a kid from pee wee until midget. But I haven't been on skates in 30 years. LOL Who cares. I'm going!!
You told them you lived in Vancouver correct.. start driving now! lol  Have fun my friend!
congradulations man!!!! soooooo cool!!!.make sure you have an entourage fully armed with cameras ....see if you can stage a fight scene ....   CHEERS!
Make sure to ask where the auger and bait are when you get there.
Don't let the Leafs try to sucker you into a contract Dan. It ain't worth it!!  Congrats on the win!
Have fun Dan!  Give him a good body check, see if he'll hit back...something he doesn't seem to do anymore...
Don't forget to wear your HABS jersy!  Tracker (Don)
Already thought of that LOL. I'll see what I can do.
Just remember to put on the foil before you tape your hands...   I'm just sayin.  Congratulation Dan C

If you haven't been on skates for 30 yrs you might fit right in for a contract with the Leaf's oop's did I say that out load lol Have a great time beg, borrow or steal a video camera if you don't have one SBK
Congrats!
How about setting up a dozen tipups on the blue line? Better still, put them in front of the net. There'll be less chance of them getting broken there.  Really happy for you Bud!
Congrats Dan  bring an auger and bait instead Make a tip up out of his hockey stick

Dang Dan that sure is a great prize to win hope ya have fun and all kidding aside dont start in net unless your ready for a pounding but then again your moves of fear could be better then the goalies they have already.  Cheers and I cant wait for the report maybe you can twitter it here for all of us to follow you on the ice just keep updating the thread for us.
He drilled 3 holes and after each one a deep voice says " their are no fish here" finally a man comes out and takes his drill and says"it's a hockey rink you diptube"   Art
Way to go Dan! Congrats on the win and I'm glad things are starting to fall into place for your trip. Enjoy!
I don't know about that. This one in tonights game looked like it may have left a lasting impression.  OUCH!!!!!!
Congrats.   Maybe you can get Sako Koivu to substitue for Phaneuf
Right ON bud!!! Congrats.  Now... borrow or steal a pair of skates and find a frozen pond to get the 30 years of kinks out.
It would have to be a staged fight because Dion wouldn`t drop the gloves! Meow  Congrats and have fun and keep your head up!
Thanks for the good wishes etc. Now if the boss could send me a hat, I'll see if Dion will pose for a photo with an OFC hat. Hear that boss??
